00019 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00020 // D3DXF_FILEFORMAT
00021 //   This flag is used to specify what file type to use when saving to disk.
00022 //   _BINARY, and _TEXT are mutually exclusive, while
00023 //   _COMPRESSED is an optional setting that works with all file types.
00024 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 typedef DWORD D3DXF_FILEFORMAT;
00026 
00027 #define D3DXF_FILEFORMAT_BINARY          0
00028 #define D3DXF_FILEFORMAT_TEXT            1
00029 #define D3DXF_FILEFORMAT_COMPRESSED      2
00030 
00031 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 // D3DXF_FILESAVEOPTIONS
00033 //   This flag is used to specify where to save the file to. Each flag is
00034 //   mutually exclusive, indicates the data location of the file, and also
00035 //   chooses which additional data will specify the location.
00036 //   _TOFILE is paired with a filename (LPCSTR)
00037 //   _TOWFILE is paired with a filename (LPWSTR)
00038 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 typedef DWORD D3DXF_FILESAVEOPTIONS;
00040 
00041 #define D3DXF_FILESAVE_TOFILE     0x00L
00042 #define D3DXF_FILESAVE_TOWFILE    0x01L
00043 
00044 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 // D3DXF_FILELOADOPTIONS
00046 //   This flag is used to specify where to load the file from. Each flag is
00047 //   mutually exclusive, indicates the data location of the file, and also
00048 //   chooses which additional data will specify the location.
00049 //   _FROMFILE is paired with a filename (LPCSTR)
00050 //   _FROMWFILE is paired with a filename (LPWSTR)
00051 //   _FROMRESOURCE is paired with a (D3DXF_FILELOADRESOUCE*) description.
00052 //   _FROMMEMORY is paired with a (D3DXF_FILELOADMEMORY*) description.
00053 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 typedef DWORD D3DXF_FILELOADOPTIONS;
00055 
00056 #define D3DXF_FILELOAD_FROMFILE     0x00L
00057 #define D3DXF_FILELOAD_FROMWFILE    0x01L
00058 #define D3DXF_FILELOAD_FROMRESOURCE 0x02L
00059 #define D3DXF_FILELOAD_FROMMEMORY   0x03L
00060 
00061 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 // D3DXF_FILELOADRESOURCE:
00063 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 
00065 typedef struct _D3DXF_FILELOADRESOURCE
00066 {
00067     HMODULE hModule; // Desc
00068     LPCSTR lpName;  // Desc
00069     LPCSTR lpType;  // Desc
00070 } D3DXF_FILELOADRESOURCE;
00071 
00072 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00073 // D3DXF_FILELOADMEMORY:
00074 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 
00076 typedef struct _D3DXF_FILELOADMEMORY
00077 {
00078     LPCVOID lpMemory; // Desc
00079     SIZE_T  dSize;     // Desc
00080 } D3DXF_FILELOADMEMORY;

00154 {
00155     STDMETHOD( QueryInterface )( THIS_ REFIID, LPVOID* ) PURE;
00156     STDMETHOD_( ULONG, AddRef )( THIS ) PURE;
00157     STDMETHOD_( ULONG, Release )( THIS ) PURE;
00158     
00159     STDMETHOD( CreateEnumObject )( THIS_ LPCVOID, D3DXF_FILELOADOPTIONS,
00160         ID3DXFileEnumObject** ) PURE;
00161     STDMETHOD( CreateSaveObject )( THIS_ LPCVOID, D3DXF_FILESAVEOPTIONS,
00162         D3DXF_FILEFORMAT, ID3DXFileSaveObject** ) PURE;
00163     STDMETHOD( RegisterTemplates )( THIS_ LPCVOID, SIZE_T ) PURE;
00164     STDMETHOD( RegisterEnumTemplates )( THIS_ ID3DXFileEnumObject* ) PURE;
00165 };

00254 /*
00255  * DirectX File errors.
00256  */
00257 
00258 #define _FACD3DXF 0x876
00259 
00260 #define D3DXFERR_BADOBJECT              MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 900 )
00261 #define D3DXFERR_BADVALUE               MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 901 )
00262 #define D3DXFERR_BADTYPE                MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 902 )
00263 #define D3DXFERR_NOTFOUND               MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 903 )
00264 #define D3DXFERR_NOTDONEYET             MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 904 )
00265 #define D3DXFERR_FILENOTFOUND           MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 905 )
00266 #define D3DXFERR_RESOURCENOTFOUND       MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 906 )
00267 #define D3DXFERR_BADRESOURCE            MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 907 )
00268 #define D3DXFERR_BADFILETYPE            MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 908 )
00269 #define D3DXFERR_BADFILEVERSION         MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 909 )
00270 #define D3DXFERR_BADFILEFLOATSIZE       MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 910 )
00271 #define D3DXFERR_BADFILE                MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 911 )
00272 #define D3DXFERR_PARSEERROR             MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 912 )
00273 #define D3DXFERR_BADARRAYSIZE           MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 913 )
00274 #define D3DXFERR_BADDATAREFERENCE       MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 914 )
00275 #define D3DXFERR_NOMOREOBJECTS          MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 915 )
00276 #define D3DXFERR_NOMOREDATA             MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 916 )
00277 #define D3DXFERR_BADCACHEFILE           MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACD3DXF, 917 )
